root.name: The Sea Will Claim Everything
root.description: OverviewThe Sea Will Claim Everything, a point-and-click adventure game by Jonas Kyratzes, starts with a magical portal that allows the player to interact with the denizens of the Fortunate Isles. The journey begins in Underhome, the subterranean dwelling of the Mysterious-Druid family. This ancient place, which is a marvel of biotechnology, is facing foreclosure by Lord Urizen. The player's help is desperately required.The gameâ€™s hand-drawn graphics were created by Verena Kyratzes and features music by Chris Christodoulou.

similar_games.game: I Get This Call Every Day
